articles.author: Shannon Najmabadi, Julian Mark, Amaya Verde
articles.title: Stocks surged in 2024 even as Americans fretted over the economy - The Washington Post
articles.description: The S&P 500 gained more than 24 percent, highlighting a disconnect between the day-to-day experience of households and the performance of their investments.
articles.content: Return to menuThe S&P 500s record gains in the first half of 2024 were driven by seven tech stocks that significantly outperformed the other companies on the index. The Magnificent Seven Alphabet… [+1475 chars]
